sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Osaic Holdings Inc. Increases Stock Position in Ouster, Inc. $OUST
feed.summary: Osaic Holdings Inc. significantly boosted its stake in Ouster, Inc. by 3,452.7% in Q2, acquiring an additional 118,462 shares to own a total of 121,893 shares valued at approximately $2.96 million. This increase makes Osaic Holdings Inc. hold about 0.21% of the company's stock. The article also notes recent insider sales and largely positive analyst sentiment with a "Moderate Buy" rating.

feed.title: Metavasi Capital LP Makes New $3.03 Million Investment in Ouster, Inc. $OUST
feed.summary: Metavasi Capital LP has invested $3.03 million in Ouster, Inc. (NYSE:OUST), acquiring 125,000 shares, making it their 28th-largest holding. Other major institutional investors have also adjusted their positions in Ouster, while some insiders have recently sold shares. Wall Street analysts currently rate Ouster as a "Moderate Buy" with an average price target of $32.17.

feed.title: Ouster, Inc. $OUST Shares Purchased by Marshall Wace LLP
feed.summary: Marshall Wace LLP increased its stake in Ouster, Inc. (NYSE:OUST) by 29% in the second quarter, purchasing an additional 154,353 shares, bringing their total ownership to 687,260 shares valued at approximately $16.67 million. Other institutional investors like Invesco Ltd. and AQR Capital Management LLC also significantly boosted their positions. Despite insider selling, the stock maintains a consensus "Buy" rating from analysts with a target price of $32.17.

feed.title: Handelsbanken Fonder AB Takes Position in Ouster, Inc. $OUST
feed.summary: Handelsbanken Fonder AB has initiated a new position in Ouster, Inc. (NYSE:OUST) by purchasing 20,415 shares valued at approximately $496,000 during the second quarter. This move comes as institutional ownership in Ouster reaches 31.45% amidst notable insider selling from top executives. Wall Street analysts maintain a "Buy" consensus rating for Ouster, with an average target price of $32.17.

feed.title: Ouster, Inc. (OUST) Stock Declines While Market Improves: Some Information for Investors
feed.summary: Ouster, Inc. (OUST) recently closed down 10.73% at $33.10, despite broader market improvements. Over the past month, the stock has appreciated by 34.25%, outperforming the Computer and Technology sector. Investors are awaiting its upcoming earnings release on November 4, 2025, with expectations of a 20.37% EPS increase and a 30.88% rise in revenue year-over-year.

feed.title: Ouster Inc options imply 14.5% move in share price post-earnings
feed.summary: Options trading for Ouster Inc (OUST) suggests a potential 14.5% movement in its share price following the upcoming earnings release, with calls outpacing puts 2:1. Historically, the median price movement after earnings for Ouster has been 21.3% over the past eight quarters. This article highlights the implied volatility and investor anticipation ahead of the financial results.

feed.title: Sensor Shipments Hit Record, Ouster Shares Pop 10.7% After Earnings
feed.summary: Ouster (OUST) reported strong Q3 earnings, exceeding revenue estimates with $39.5M and shipping a record 7,200 sensors, leading to a 10.7% stock jump. While gross margins improved year-over-year, sequential decline and modest Q4 guidance suggest cautious optimism for future growth and profitability. The company remains focused on product development and achieving profitability.

feed.title: Ouster stock hits 52-week high at 36.3 USD By Investing.com - Investing.com Canada
feed.summary: The article reports that Ouster's stock has reached a new 52-week high, trading at 36.3 USD. However, due to a client-side exception, the full content of the Investing.com article regarding this event is currently unavailable. This limitation prevents a detailed analysis of the factors contributing to the stock's performance.

feed.title: Ouster Announces Date for Third Quarter 2025 Earnings Call - MarketScreener
feed.summary: Ouster, Inc. announced it will report its financial results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2025, after market close on Tuesday, November 4, 2025. The company will also host a conference call on the same day at 5:00 p.m. ET to discuss its results. A webcast registration link and replay information are provided for interested parties.

feed.title: Ouster Announces Date for Third Quarter 2025 Earnings Call - The Joplin Globe
feed.summary: Ouster, Inc. announced that it will report its financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2025, after market close on Tuesday, November 4, 2025. The company will also host a conference call on the same day at 5:00 p.m. ET to discuss the results. Registration for the webcast and access to the replay will be available on Ouster's investor website.

feed.title: Ouster, Inc. (NASDAQ:OUST) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
feed.summary: Ouster, Inc. (NASDAQ: OUST) reported strong Q2 2025 results, exceeding revenue guidance with $35 million and a solid gross margin of 45%. The company emphasized its transition to a Physical AI company, driven by record sensor shipments, strategic investments in AI, and significant progress across scaling software-attached business, transforming its product portfolio, and executing towards profitability. Ouster expects continued momentum, projecting Q3 revenue between $35 million and $38 million, and highlighted expansions into defense, smart infrastructure, and automotive verticals.

feed.title: Ouster Gemini Launches Genetec Security Center Integration
feed.summary: Ouster, Inc. announced the integration of its digital lidar perception platform, Ouster Gemini, with Genetec™ Security Center. This integration allows customers to combine lidar and video surveillance into a single interface for enhanced security operations, enabling more accurate intrusion detection, classification, and tracking across wide areas and varying conditions. The partnership with Genetec, a global security management provider, aims to deliver best-in-class physical security with reduced false alarms and cost savings.

feed.title: Elon Musk and Trump Push for Self-Driving Cars: 3 Stocks to Gain
feed.summary: With a potential Trump administration in 2025 and Elon Musk's influence, speculation is rising that regulations for self-driving cars and Robotaxis will accelerate. This article highlights three companies – Mobileye, Ouster, and Aurora Innovation – that are poised to benefit significantly from the widespread deployment of autonomous vehicles. These companies offer critical technologies, from advanced driver assistance systems to LiDAR sensors and complete self-driving platforms, essential for the future of autonomous transportation.

feed.title: Lidar duo Ouster and Velodyne to merge in all-stock deal
feed.summary: Lidar companies Ouster Inc and Velodyne Lidar Inc have agreed to an all-share merger to consolidate their operations and pursue profitability in the autonomous vehicle technology sector. Both companies have seen significant stock value decreases due to extended timelines for autonomous vehicle deployment. The merger, which will result in a combined market capitalization of approximately $400 million, aims for at least $75 million in annualized cost savings within nine months.

feed.title: Ouster and Velodyne Announce Proposed Merger of Equals to Accelerate Lidar Adoption
feed.summary: Ouster and Velodyne have announced a definitive agreement to merge in an all-stock transaction, aiming to create significant value, strengthen their financial position, and accelerate lidar adoption through robust product offerings and increased operational efficiencies. The combined company will be led by Angus Pacala as CEO and Dr. Ted Tewksbury as Executive Chairman, with both companies' shareholders each owning approximately 50% of the new entity. The merger is expected to achieve at least $75 million in annualized operational expenditure synergies within nine months of closing, targeting completion in the first half of 2023.

feed.title: Ouster and Serve Robotics Sign Multi-Year Strategic Agreement to Support Expansion of Autonomous Delivery Fleets
feed.summary: Ouster and Serve Robotics have signed a multi-year strategic agreement for Ouster to supply thousands of digital lidar sensors through 2025. This collaboration will support Serve Robotics' expansion of its autonomous delivery fleets across cities, with each next-generation robot outfitted with an Ouster OS1 sensor for safe and efficient navigation. The agreement underscores the growing market for lidar in the robotics industry, projected to reach $1.8 billion by 2025.

feed.title: Local Motors Selects Ouster Lidar for Production of Its Next-Generation Autonomous Shuttles
feed.summary: Ouster, Inc. has signed a strategic customer agreement with Local Motors to supply over one thousand OS digital lidar sensors by 2023, with a forecast of over 20,000 sensors through 2025. These sensors will be integrated into Local Motors' next-generation 3D printed autonomous shuttles, Olli 2.0, to enhance their reliability, affordability, and scalability for Level 3 autonomous operations. This partnership aims to improve the performance of the shuttles, which have already provided autonomous mobility in ten countries.

feed.title: Ouster to Begin Trading on the New York Stock Exchange Today Under Ticker Symbol “OUST”
feed.summary: Ouster, Inc., a leading provider of high-resolution digital lidar sensors, announced that its common stock will begin trading on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol “OUST” today. This marks a significant milestone in Ouster’s evolution to a public company, enabling it to accelerate the adoption of its technology and drive long-term shareholder value. The company has also formalized its board of directors, adding substantial expertise to support its rapid growth and expansion plans.
